====Usage notes====
{{l|cmn|埋怨|tr=mányuàn}} differs from its near-synonym {{l|cmn|抱怨|tr=bàoyuàn}} in that the former term can be directed at both oneself and others, while the latter term can only be directed at others. Note, also, the pronunciation of {{l|cmn|埋}} in {{l|cmn|埋怨}} as mán, not the usual mái.
